ImageProcessor¶

class imageprocessor.ImageProcessor(images, target_dimensions=None, augment_data=False, rgb=False, time_series=False)[source]¶

Performs image dataset pre-processing such as resizing, augmenting the dataset, etc.

Parameters:
  • images – List of raw image samples.
  • target_dimensions – Final dimensions of training images.
  • augment_data – If true, will augment data with ImageDataGenerator.
  • rgb – True if raw images are in rgb.
  • time_series – True if each sample is a series of images.
process_training_data()[source]¶
Returns:List of processed image data.
